alert.note: Alert for Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:34AM CDT until April 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Illinois... Fox River Near Berlin affecting Green Lake County. Fox River Lower Near New Munster affecting Kenosha and Lake Counties. Wisconsin River At Portage affecting Columbia County. .Residual effects from recent rainfall and snow melt will continue to contribute to river flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fox River near Berlin. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.2 feet, There is minor flooding in the Berlin area including in Riverside and Webster Street Parks in Berlin. This level is about a 50 percent chance flood meaning there is a 50 percent chance in any given year of the river reaching this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Saturday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 12.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.2 feet on 04/19/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && River forecasts are available for some but not all river gaging locations. The 7 day river forecast takes into account past precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and predicted precipitation for the basin. Precipitation is for the next 24 hours in the future from April through September and for 48 hours in the future from October through March. (Stages in ft.) Bank- Latest Forecast stages - Flood full observed ...for 1 pm... Location stage stage stage/time Sun Mon Tue Wed Berlin 13.0 12.0 13.22 9 am 4/08 13.2 13.2 13.2 13.1 - Highest 24 hour change - observed in river stage - stage in (ft.) up to Highest stage - the last latest observed forecast in - 7 days stage next 7 days Berlin 13.23 8 am 4/08 0.03 13.20 1 am 4/12 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM CDT.
